title: Forwarded Call Information on Pixel 3
content:
Can forwarded calls be marked as such to be differentiated from direct calls to my phone number, with a notification or some text on the call info.

It is a feature that is available on many different phone, such as the LG Q Stylo+, but not on the pixel seemingly.

I have already contacted my service provider( BELL ) to confirm it was set up on their side for me to know that it is a forwarded message if my phone has that feature available.

Thank you for your help.
